From: S.R.A., To: Ruby Chandler Postcard Info: Collett Park, Terre Haute, Ind. Mailed From: Terre Haute, Indiana on May 23, 1911

Miss Ruby Chandler 253 N. Estille Ave. Wichita, Kansas

Terre Haute 5/22/11 Friend Ruby, Your card received and credited to the sender. To be sure, it was appropriate in a sense. Hope and pray that you are enjoying life among the sunflowers. I think others are missed also in Pearl, the first. Would like to hear from you. S.R.A 931 North Place
